description: OmegaEngine output JSON schema for v2.5.1.

flavor.description: Flavor used for this post. Example: 'piano_info', 'piano_lesson'.

title.description: Final title of the blog post.

sections.description: Main body sections. Each section has heading + body.

rules: section.index SHOULD start from 1 and increase by 1.
section_count in flavor file SHOULD match sections.length when present.
